com.github.mdsimmo.bomberman.utils

Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mdsimmo.bomberman.utils.Box
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Region, Serializable, org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable

    public final class Box
extends Object
implements Region
    A box is a cuboid region of a single world.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • bounds

        public static Box bounds(Place a,
                         Place b)
        Returns the smallest possible box that contains both locations.
        Parameters:
        a - one location
        b - another location in the same world
        Returns:
        a box tht bounds both locations
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either a or b is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the locations contain different worlds

      • bounds

        public static Box bounds(org.bukkit.block.Block a,
                         org.bukkit.block.Block b)
        Gets the smallest possible box that contains both blocks
        Parameters:
        a - one block
        b - another block
        Returns:
        a box bounding both blocks
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if a or b is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the blocks are in different worlds
